explains: n. 奇特，奇怪；单一，独特；（数，物理）奇点

sentences.en: It would be wonderful to observe a singularity and obtain direct evidence of the undoubtedly bizarre phenomena that occur near one.
sentences.cn: 如果能观察到一颗奇点，并获取关于奇点附近出现的可信的怪异现象的直接证据，那将非常好。

sentences.en: What Will the Singularity Look Like?
sentences.cn: 这个奇点将会是怎样的？

sentences.en: Singularity is almost invariably a clue.
sentences.cn: 奇特几乎总能提供一种线索。
